marketing: Shell GadusRail S3 Wheel Flange Grease 2 is a lithium/calcium soap grease which allows better protection specifically in wet and other harsh conditions. The advanced amount of solid additives and specifically tested combination in addition to a specifically formulated multipurpose additive package make it the best in class of our railroad track lubricants. Its outstanding friction reduction and long lasting protection has been proven in extensive field trial on test tracks. This grease can also be used in applications in construction, mining and agricultural equipment.
